API Knowledge:
kotlin.collections.List.indexOf is used to find the index of the first occurrence of an element in the list.
kotlin.collections.List.lastIndexOf is used to find the index of the last occurrence of an element in the list.
Claim: Based on the API Knowledge above, kotlin.collections.List.indexOf and kotlin.collections.List.lastIndexOf have similar usage.

API Knowledge:
kotlin.text.StringBuilder.append is used to append the string representation of the specified object to this sequence.
kotlin.text.StringBuilder.appendLine is used to append the string representation of the specified object followed by a line terminator to this sequence.
Claim: Based on the API Knowledge above, kotlin.text.StringBuilder.append and kotlin.text.StringBuilder.appendLine have similar usage.

API Knowledge:
kotlin.system.exitProcess() in Kotlin is used to terminate the current process and return a specified exit code to the operating system.
kotlin.collections.List.indexOf() in Kotlin is used to find the index of the first occurrence of a specified element in the list, or -1 if the element is not present.
Claim: Based on the API Knowledge above, kotlin.system.exitProcess() and kotlin.collections.List.indexOf() have similar usage.

API Knowledge:
kotlin.io.File.readBytes is used to read the file content as a byte array.
kotlin.io.File.readText is used to read the file content as a string.
Claim: Based on the API Knowledge above, kotlin.io.File.readBytes and kotlin.io.File.readText have similar usage.
